name: Party Minigames 2 3 4 players
summary:
It's time to beat your friends in mini-games playing at the same time on the same device. Senior Games presents you this compilation of quick games for 1 2 3 4 people. 2 players, 3 players and up to 4 players at a time can enjoy a unique multiplayer experience.
Fun is assured with this collection of party mini-games to play on the same mobile or tablet several friends. Start the battle of 2 players, 3 players or up to 4 players. Have a great time with competitive multiplayer games. Many games in one and all you need is a smartphone or tablet and you can play offline.
In the cool multiplayer games from the party games collection you can play with two players, but if you have more friends or family and you are many players you can challenge 3 players or 4 players. Have fun with this competitive multiplayer game. For those times when you are alone, play in 1 player mode against the bot and improve your skills to become the best. You don't need an internet connection to play. Play offline for free!
All the party games and fun pastimes in this board game have simple controls and simple rules that are easy to understand. Party games is ideal for people of all ages; the very young, adults and even senior players. With 2 3 4 players of any age, fun is guaranteed. Let the party begin!
